topic.title: How to Add a Blank Page After a Topic

body.p: If you want to add a new blank page after a topic, add the following rules to your customization CSS.
Associate this page to the :after pseudo element of the topic:
In the XML content, on the topic element set the outputclass to the add-separator-page value.
In this way, the :after pseudo element will be created next to the topic content and will be placed on the topic-separating-page.
Use the page margin box selectors to override the default content from the headers/footers.
body.note: You can set the output class on the topicref element from the DITA map instead of the topic element. In this way you can reuse the topic in another context where the page breaking is not necessary.
